comments:
Description:
Fail to preview template item in xls format.
Build number:2.2.0.v20070529

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a item, change it to a template item.
2. Preview in xls format.

Expected result:
Preview is ok.

Actuate result:
Error happens while running the report.

Preview any report in excel will fail

Fixed problem when preview report containing template.
Some other reports still can't be previewed, while the problem is different. Plese submit new bugs.
